PageWidgetPortable.Title: Pendentes
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_MF_ORDEMSERVICOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.TMSLNGPOLO IS NULL AND A.STATUS <> 3 AND A.ADIANTAMENTO IS NULL AND A.STATUS <> 4 AND (EXISTS(SELECT HANDLE FROM MF_PARAMETROS WHERE EMPRESA = A.EMPRESA AND SISTEMATMSNATECNOLOGIABENNER = 'N') OR A.PAGADOR IS NOT NULL )</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t2619_at7040_hsa92da86e.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
